metadata.title: CVE-2020-25860 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: The install.c module in the Pengutronix RAUC update client prior to version1.5 has a Time-of-Check Time-of-Use vulnerability, where signatureverification on an update file takes place before the file is reopened forinstallation. An attacker who can modify the update file just before it isreopened can install arbitrary code on the device.

criterions.comment: rauc package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
